name: TOGETHER FOREVER (Robotpencil 🖊️Games🎮)
description:
OVERVIEW

I have done another Game Jam for Ryan Laley's Spring Game Jam 
I did this in about 12 hours total haha
I hope you enjoy! Level 4 may very well be unbeatable but I bet you can beat it :) GLHF

Rules & Controls:

Survive the time

Your main ship can only take 3 hits or game over

Other ships can take plenty of hits but they disconnect from you. 

You must leave each level with other ships connected or you get a game over when time runs out.

WASD to move

Credits:

Art,Design,SFX - Anthony Jones aka Me
Music - The Beaverhouse: Journey's Seperate Ways 8-bit
